ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the total amount (treatment +vehicle) that was administered/given to the subject.

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECVAMT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable. The SDTM variable ECTRTV may also be populated during the process of creating the SDTM submission datasets.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Administration amount that was given to the subject. Note: should not be the diluent amount alone. The ECTRTV field may be collected if it cannot be determined from other sources.
